physical_appearance:\The image depicts a typewritten letter. The subject of the correspondence is \\Welcome to 1 Suffolk and Other Units aboard HMT Dilwara\\. It has a \\Restricted\\ classification and \\21 Jun 1949\\ is stated at the top right hand side of the letter. There are 5 numbered points in the letter
subject_terms_1:with letters serving as the sub-points. Point 4 under \\Information\\ states that the troopship will berth on \\1 Jul 1949\\. \ transport (naval vessels) military personnel
